DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw #b

collector:JadeRing.NAME: Jade Ring
collector:JadeRing.FLAVOR: Jade is the symbol of honesty.

collector:SoullitLamp.NAME: Soul-lit Lamp
collector:SoullitLamp.FLAVOR: A ghoulish decoration. The crackles of fire are replaced by buzzing wails.

collector:ThimbleHelm.NAME: Thimble Helm
collector:ThimbleHelm.FLAVOR: Worn by the Spire's miniest heroes.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yTemporary_HP. While you have #yTemporary_HP, cards grant #b1 additional #yBlock.

collector:Incense.NAME: Incense
collector:Incense.FLAVOR: An antiquated form of mental clarification.
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot gain #yWeak, #yVulnerable or #yFrail while you are #yWeak, #yVulnerable or #yFrail.

collector:FuelCanister.NAME: Fuel Canister
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #yRetain the highest-cost card in your hand.

collector:AutoCurser.NAME: Hexx Talisman
collector:AutoCurser.FLAVOR: "When I put this on, my rate of toe-stubbing increased drastically. I think it works!" - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, apply #b1 #yWeak and #yVulnerable to a random enemy.

collector:Bagpipes.NAME: The Bagpipes
collector:Bagpipes.FLAVOR: This cursed, dreaded instrument is said to have driven Kublai the Great mad.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yWeak or #yVulnerable, increase the amount applied by #b1.
